name: Checkout!
description:
WHO WILL BECOME THE ULTIMATE CHECKOUT CHAMPION?

In Checkout! you compete to be the first player to turn in all the items in your shopping list. We have a variety of environments, game modes, and modifiers for you to enjoy. Up to 4 players can play locally or online via Steam Remote Play.

MULTIDIMENSIONAL MARKET MAYHEM

Prove your worth in supermarkets from different dimensions, each with its own set of unique items, hazards and traps.

GAMEMODE GALORE

Your skills will be put to the test in a variaty of game modes.
